Package view

Class ViewUtilities

java.lang.Object
view.ViewUtilities
public class ViewUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
The class View utilities stores some constants which are commonly used in several views. These constants are static so that they are accessible without the need of creating a new class.
Version:
22/5/2021
Author:
Riccardo Giacalone (ricardo.giacalone@students.salle.url.edu), Guillermo Gonzalez (guillermo.g@students.salle.url.edu), Oscar Cubeles (oscar.cubeles@students.salle.url.edu), Goddy Clinton (weriwohmbang.g@students.salle.url.edu)
